name: Anyplace ONLINE POKER - Texas Holdem with friends.
name_original: Anyplace ONLINE POKER - Texas Holdem with friends.
description:
THIS IS REVOLUTION!
THE BEST WAY TO PLAY POKER WITH YOUR FRIENDS!
All best features of messengers now used to play Texas Holdem with your friends!

1. SIMPLE INVITATION TO THE GAME!
To invite a friend to play poker simply choose him from CONTACTS (address book) of your smartphone!

2. ABSOLUTELY FREE!
No need to buy poker chips in the app! Never!
We do not try to sell you poker chips! The app simply substitues poker room (cards, chips & poker dealer). For free!

3. EASY & QUICK REGISTRATION!
No login or password required! No need to remeber password! Account linked to your phone number, same as in messengers!

Follow the trend! Go out of virtual reality to real life!
Play games with people you know!
What is the pleasure to beat the person from the different end of the world? You'll never even see them!

Beat your friends!
It's much more fun!
